item.title: Laravel Framework
item.description: Package installation From your console navigate to your application folder and run composer require For more information about composer click Composer Basic Usage composer require shieldfy/shieldfy-php-client Add your Key & Secret Add your api key, api secret in your .env file SHIELDFY_APP_KEY=<YOUR_APP_KEY> SHIELDFY_APP_SECRET=<YOUR_APP_SECRET> Register Service Provider (Laravel < 5.5) We leverage service provider auto discovery feature in laravel 5.5 , but if you are using laravel before 5.

item.title: CodeIgniter Framework
item.description: Package installation From your console navigate to your application folder and run composer require For more information about composer click Composer Basic Usage composer require shieldfy/shieldfy-php-client Enable Shieldfy Hook Enable hooks in the config application/config/config.php $config['enable_hooks'] = TRUE; Add the following lines at the end of application/config/hooks.php file if(!class_exists(\Composer\Autoload\ClassLoader::class)) require_once(FCPATH.'/vendor/autoload.php'); $shieldfy = \Shieldfy\Guard::init([ 'app_key' => '<YOUR_APP_KEY>', 'app_secret' => '<YOUR_APP_SECRET>' ]); $hook['post_controller_constructor'] = \Shieldfy\Extensions\CodeIgniter\Bridge::hook($shieldfy,isset($hook) ? $hook : null);
